TopicTitle: How to create a custom action?

Articles.Content:
How i can create a custom action?

I want create an action to use it in action groups for infernal robotics. (Coarse Speed+ and Coarse Speed-)

For action i mean something that i can put it in an action group (Example: lock gimbal, etc)

You would need to program a mod to do that - the preferred language used by KSP modders being C#.

The forum section http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development should help.

I don't know programming etc, can i do it directly from the settings of the mod\ksp? (Personal purposes)

Or maybe there is a mod that permits me this?

That 'somewhere' would be in the Infernal Robotics .dll. It's a programme. If you can programme you can mod it, or write your own KSP mod. If you can't then you really don't want to be poking sticks at it.

That 'somewhere' would be in the Infernal Robotics .dll. It's a programme. If you can programme you can mod it, or write your own KSP mod. If you can't then you really don't want to be poking sticks at it.

To elaborate on this, it's a .dll most likely mritten in C# (a.k.a. C sharp, a.k.a. Object C). If you read up on some basic C# syntax and the fundamentals of object oriented coding (in any language, really) you'll probably learn enough to alter someone elses code in a day or two.
